mailing-address.narrative: BP 96 Niamakoro Route de l'Aeroport Bamako

sector.narrative: Multisector aid for basic social services
Parenting Programme to promote nurturing care and early stimulation
Provision of multiple-levels (or alternative pathways of education) teacher training
Provision or procurement of primary education learning materials
System strengthening - community participation and social accountability, e.g. school management committees
Technical assistance - Equitable access to quality education

description.narrative: Development Partner affairs Technical staff services
Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities social services (incl youth development and women+ children)

title.narrative: Mali United Nations Development Assistance Framework Results Matrix
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace

2019 Mali: Evaluation formative des stratégies de renforcement des capacités au Mali 2015-2019
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 22.02: D’ici fin 2019, 2,632 structure scolaires (CDPE, F1 et F2) dans les région du Mali disposant des outils, et des compétences pour mettre en œuvre et suivre l’évolution des compétence d’apprentissages des filles et des garçons - y compris les plus marginalisés et ceux vivant avec un handicap – de 3 à 15 ans

description.narrative: Discontinued. No activity has been undertaken on this output in 2018. This output has not been active since end 2017 and will be disactivated as soon as the Open Items related to supply are closed, and orders delivered and paid. | Status:Discontinued | As-of Date:16/01/2019
